name: Cycle Deck
description: Use a quick cycle deck with a total cost of no more than 2.9 elixir drops. This type of deck will improve your ability to defend with low-cost cards.

name: Tornado Practice
description: Use a deck that contains Tornado. In the game, you should activate your King Tower with it.

name: Magic Archer
description: Use a deck with Magic Archer. You should hit the tower with the Magic Archer at least 3 times.
